channel.title: Adding NPC's make's client fail to run - with VIDEO
channel.description:
I have another server that my npc's work fine. But with my new project, when i add npc's to my autospawn.cfg, it makes the server totally screwed when ran. Here is a video of the actual problem: http://youtube.com/watch?v=42cTghVM3Lk I have tried replacing all the files other than client.java and i'm thinking it must be something wrong with this file, i have done alot of editing so i cannot replace client.java. When i delete the npc's from the autospawn.cfg, the server runs fine.
Any help appreciated, thanks in advance!
~jAnDa =]
EDIT! I FIXED THIS MUG MYSELF! =] THANKS ANYWAY.

item.title: Adding NPC's make's client fail to run - with VIDEO
item.dc:creator: @Vesnal1 Vesnal1
item.description:
@Vesnal1 wrote:

Patrickftw:

You did it wrong.[/quote][quote=“CripScape Jeff, post:2, topic:216820”]lol

Very nice spamming, if you don’t have any help, there is no reason to post. /on topic Janda would you mine posting what you did? I get this when ever I try to add multiple NPCS with the same ID. Like a bunch of guards, or penguins.

Read full topic
